note.title: Note to Readers
note.t: Discussion of this document takes place on the EAPPARAMETEREXTENSION Working Group mailing list (eapparameterextension@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/eapparameterextension/.
Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/Janfred/draft-rieckers-eapparameterextension.
